EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Training Webinar - Covering New Features of v4.5
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
VMTurbo recently released v4.5, with a host of new features and functionality. Join a 90 minute jumpstart training webinar on March 4th see how these features work.
REGISTER for the training today: - Webinar: Tue, Mar 4, 2014 @ 12-1:30p Eastern <http://bit.ly/1lrmrYL> - Email education@vmturbo.com to schedule a one-on-one training
The training will address new features in v4.5. You will learn how to:
- Automate VMTurbo recommendations to converge and keep your environment in its optimal state, where you assure application performance while utilizing your infrastructure as efficiently as possible - Use VMTurbo to analyze historical trends and project resource needs - Customize the VMTurbo dashboards - Plan for potential workload fluctuations and hardware migrations - Investigate how infrastructure changes would affect performance - Generate action plans to transform your environment into the desired state - View the new supply chain and workload dashboards
Still need to UPGRADE? - View the guide here <http://bit.ly/1faxDDL>
More TRAINING options: - Comprehensive paid training (on-site or remotely via a webex session). The remote training takes 3 hours (or two 90-minute sessions) and costs $1,500. The on-site class is 1 day, costs $2,500 (+travel expenses), and includes a series of hands-on lab exercises. For additional information, please feel free to contact VMTurbo Education at education@vmturbo.com, or visit our website for additional information <http://go.vmturbo.com/pso-training-request.html>.
Sincerely, VMTurbo
